thread.title: RUMOURS: The new Ibrahimovic? Real Madrid set to complete €10m Isak signing
thread.title_full: RUMOURS: The new Ibrahimovic? Real Madrid set to complete €10m Isak signing

title: RUMOURS: The new Ibrahimovic? Real Madrid set to complete €10m Isak signing
text:
0 Jan 17, 2017 6:29:19 PM The 17-year-old striker's agents are expected in the Spanish capital later this week to put pen to paper on a lucrative transfer 
Real Madrid are set to complete the signing of Swedish wonderkid Alexander Isak, according to AS . 
The 17-year-old - who has been compared to compatriot Zlatan Ibrahimovic - shares an agent with Luka Modric and has won rave reviews for his performances at AIK. 
And the Merengue are expected to put the final touches on a permanent deal this week, with the fee for the teenager estimated at around €10 million.
